name: Asteroid fight (itch) (rekstilo)
description:
You appear in the middle of the space surrounded by space ships and asteroids! Destroy them and stop them from getting to earth. You have limited time... 

Custom game with low-poly space ships made by me with blender. 

This is my first game :) I expect to make improvements. 

I'd be gratefull if you leave your comment with your sincere opinin.

Thanks!
